column1: Not gonna lie. Coronavirus SARS-CoV-2 COVID-19 is the scariest thing I’ve ever seen in my life. I’m stressed, scared and speechless. I’m also focused and working on diagnostic solutions, but this is apocalyptic and terrifying. Horrible news @DailyMirror:https://www.mirror.co.uk/news/world-news/coronavirus-patients-apocalypse-ward-gasp-21723273 …
